title: When writing initials do you put a period at the end of the last letter? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are using a period after each letter, you would use a period after the last letter. D.A.R.E. If you are not using a period after each letter, you would not use a period after the last letter unless it is the end of the sentence. If a period appears at the end of my example, the program added it automatically, sorry. There should be no period at the end of this example. NASA
